    • Field Detail

      • first

        public final Point2d first
        The first point of the segment. It is not greater than the second point.
        See Also:
        Point4d.compareTo(Point4d)

      • second

        public final Point2d second
        The second point of the segment. It is not less than the first point.
        See Also:
        Point4d.compareTo(Point4d)

      • color

        public final java.awt.Color color
        The color of the segment

    • Constructor Detail

      • Segment2d

        public Segment2d(Point2d a,
         Point2d b,
         java.awt.Color color)
        Constructs segment with the specified two points and color. The second point should not be less than the first point if it is not so then they are swapped.
        Parameters:
        a - first point
        b - second point
        color - color of segment
        See Also:
        Point4d.compareTo(Point4d)

      • Segment2d

        public Segment2d(Point2d a,
         Point2d b)
        Constructs segment with the specified two points only. The color is considered to be Color.BLACK The second point should not be less than the first point if it is not so then they are swapped.
        Parameters:
        a - first point
        b - second point
        See Also:
        Point4d.compareTo(Point4d)

    • Method Detail

      • compareTo

        public int compareTo(Segment2d z)
        Compares this segment to the other segment.

        Segments are first compared by the first point then by the second point then by the color Color.getRGB()

        Specified by:
        compareTo in interface java.lang.Comparable<Segment2d>
        Parameters:
        z - the segment to compare
